p: To examine the expression of metabolic enzymes responsible for metabolic reactions, we identified metabolic enzymes among the DEPs and defined them as the differentially expressed metabolic enzymes (DEMEs). We identified 246 increased and 175 decreased DEMEs in the liver of ob/ ob mice and 21 increased and 6 decreased DEMEs in skeletal muscle of ob/ ob mice ( FigureÂ 3B).
